issue.title: [PDTS] class directory_entry should retain operator const path&() from V2

discussion.p: class directory_entry should retain operator const path&() from V2.
discussion.blockquote: This conversion operator was removed when status() and symlink_status() were added during the transition from V2 to V3 as it seemed a bit unusual to have a conversion operator for one of the several values held. Users complained as they had found the automatic conversion convenient in the most common directory_entry use case.

blockquote.pre: const path& path() const noexcept; operator const path&() const noexcept;
